MAHREZ LATEST

Riyad Mahrez is training with his Leicester team-mates as normal today and we are told his situation has not changed.

There are reports that Roma have made a second improved official bid of £30m offer for Mahrez, but that is not the case.

Talks have been held with Roma but Leicester do not want to sell and a first bid of £20m was dismissed out of hand.
